p: According to the analyses of results in Figure 5, in the twin-roll casting process, one of the most important factors is the melt level L. The influences to the temperature distribution under different conditions were discussed as below. Casting conditions are as follows: pouring temperature 981 K, casting speed 32 m/min, strip thickness 0.1 mm, and melt levels under the two pouring mode are listed in Table 3. For the one side pouring mode ( Figure 2b), it has a strip shell thickness of 1 mm (i.e., d = 1 mm).
